name: Anushka
goals_motivations: create a positive impact on others
description: I'm currently a student, juggling my studies with various personal interests. I love to take long runs and meditate, though my routine can get disrupted during busy periods. I often find myself caught in a procrastination cycle, leading to stress that affects both my work and personal life. Movies and music are important outlets for me; I enjoy thoughtful narratives, particularly in dramas and classic rock. I aim to improve my balance between work and self-care, while also staying true to my creative instincts. My inner dialogue is a mix of intuition and self-reflection, often influenced by the perspectives of those around me. I seek connection and understanding in my relationships, and strive to make a positive impact in the world.
